migrations: Why do we migrate?  It should be very easy to answer to the question “Why do we migrate?”, because it is a right. However, in El Salvador sometimes it is the only way to preserve life. In unexpected ways, violence destroys the life project that many families have, and they only have one way out of this: to leave everything behind in search of a better situation. This phenomenon is called forced displacement, but, what causes it?, what are some of the triggers involved in these cases?
